SERVER_HOST.description: Host to bind the server to (default: 0.0.0.0)
SERVER_HOST.title: SERVER_HOST

SERVER_PORT.description: Port to run the server on (default: 3001)
SERVER_PORT.title: SERVER_PORT

ERGO_NODE_API.description: URL of the Ergo node API (for node-specific features)
ERGO_NODE_API.title: ERGO_NODE_API

ERGO_NODE_API_KEY.description: API key for the Ergo node (if required)
ERGO_NODE_API_KEY.title: ERGO_NODE_API_KEY
